title: Cream filled chocolate cupcakes
ingredients: ['Cupcakes', '375g plain flour', '325g caster sugar', '30g unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 pinch salt', '2 eggs', '235ml milk', '235ml water', '235ml vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Vanilla cream filling', '250ml double cream', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
